dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.xpath
Class AbstractXPathFunctions

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.xpath.AbstractXPathFunctions

public abstract class AbstractXPathFunctions
extends java.lang.Object

This is a Helper class. Every XPathFunction class must implement this class in order to have methods available that are necessary for type conversions. To use this class just call the static method, that are provided by this class inside the XPath functions. 

 public static Object MyTestXPathFunction( CurrentContext context, Object o ) {
     DCtxt ctxt = context.getDCtxt();
     DCtxt node = toDCtxt( o );
     if( node.var.getBool() ) {
         return getReturnValue( context, true );
     } else {
         return getReturnValue( context, false );
     }
 }

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b
